unparsed_output:
According to the image, 2 OsCal tablets equal 1 gram of Calcium.

Conclusion: OsCal tablets are available in two strengths:

• 250mg tablets (6 tablets per 1 gram)
• 1250mg tablets (2 tablets per 1 gram)

Therefore, OsCal tablets can be used as an alternative to calcium supplements to meet daily nutritional needs.
